author: cms-sw
body: During PR tests for externals , we were removing externals/arch/bin, externals/arch/lib directories of release area. This was done to make sure we only use locally build externals tools. Now we multi-arch builds, we shoudl also drop externals/arch/bin/microarch, externals/arch/lib/microarch  path from the release. This makes sure and addtional libs/binaries from these dirs are not in PATH/LD_LIBRARY_PATH during PR tests.
title: [BuildRules] For PR test: drop additional microarch release/externals lib/bindirs
